title: The New client has bugs with low priority queue and they aren't even looked at
body:
1) sometimes the client will bug and not count or search for games after queue ends

2) sometimes it will restart after it ends

3) this happens 100% of the time. if you accidentally hit decline. and you queue again. you reset the timer. which is BS. this didn't happen in the older client because things would be fair if it did.


don't even tell me don't afk in the first place. sometimes its out of my hand and some things come up and more important than game.


Today. I went through 8 priority queues. you know how many more I have to go through. 3. 3 of them bugged out I had the client reset the timer 3 times. I literally had over an hour of queue time and the client just wouldn't put me up to queue.

the second time I hit decline by accident

The third time it also did what it did the first time. it just ignored the fact that It just ended and resetted again. 


One I forgot happened. but just happaned again.

the timer randomly resetted at a random time.

https://imgur.com/a/IW8r7


I swear I didn't deliberately exit the queue and show you a false timer. It literally resetted 14 minutes in for no obvious reason while I was afk in the background. I have been queueing for 6 hours today.

replies.body:
These kinds of bugs are definitely being looked into, but most people post them here in H&S where they might go unnoticed by the Devs. Make sure you post this and the screenshot over in Report a Bug to get some attention drawn to it.

On the other hand, it does look like that timer is off. Hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to what how they can go about setting this right!

From what I remember, the timer has always reset if you declined a match, or were afk during the queue. It wouldn't automatically queue you up again if you didn't accept the previous queue, and it wouldn't hold your position in queue for you if you were not there to accept. Your timer only stays the same if you accepted the queue and either someone else declined or left the champion select lobby. If you had over an hour of queue time ticking, something is most likely off. I personally would have canceled it past 2 minutes if nothing connected at all and restarted the queue. If the same problem happened, I'd likely restart my client, or even my computer.
